snippet: A lesson in diplomacy and civics can be found among more than 930,000 City Council documents that have been microfilmed and digitized and are being made available by the LaGuardia and Wagner Archives at LaGuardia Community College.
abstract: A lesson in diplomacy and civics can be found among more than 930,000 City Council documents that have been microfilmed and digitized and are being made available by the LaGuardia and Wagner Archives at LaGuardia Community College.

headline.main: A Treasure Trove of Documents, Courtesy of the City Council
headline.print_headline: With a Click, a Huge Trove of City Council Documents Opens Up
